name: Mimi Jackson
title: Budtender
coverLetter: Hi my name is Mimi and I have multiple years of experience in inventory and staff management and shipment processing. I consistently meet and exceed expectations of my sales goals. I am an excellent communicator and very reliable team player and always quick to learn and happy to be taught.
experience:
Crispy Cuban, Los Angeles, CA — Truck Manager
May 2017 - Current
Scheduled events for the truck to appear at
Kept in contact with the point person regularly through emails and phone calls
Handled cash at registers 
Enticed customers to come to our truck with front displays 
Food runner/line cook on busiest days/catered events
Safe count and banking nightly

American Apparel, Los Angeles, CA — Visual Merchandiser
September 2016 - May 2017 
Set displays multiple times throughout the week
Daily refresh of personal departments with new merchandise
Backstock and catalogue all new shipments and display materials
Steamed and pinned outfits on mannequins as well as finding matching accessories
Hung vinyals and ceiling posters
Helped maintain sales floor during peak hours
H&M, Columbus, OH — Department Supervisor
October 2012 - August 2016
Responsible for overseeing sales floor and sales staff
Head of receiving multi-weekly shipments of clothing, accessories and store hardware
In charge of payroll and correctly entering hours for each staff member daily
Prepared banking every morning to send out to bank as well as ensuring the store safe had proper change
Responsible for the proper garment rotation in my department to ensure high volume selling
